snippet: Rather than destroy an old piano, the instrument can be donated to charities like schools and camps, or even to artists.
abstract: Number of charities accept donations of used pianos, an option for owners who are emotionally attached and do not want to throw the instruments in the trash, but the reality of expensive repairs and inexpensive replacements make it impractical to keep them.
lead_paragraph: Rather than destroy an old piano, the instrument can be donated to charities like schools and camps, or even to artists.

headline.seo: Used Pianos Can Be Donated to Charities and Artists
headline.main: Where a Condemned Piano Can Win an Appeal
headline.print_headline: Where a Condemned Piano Can Win an Appeal
